{"id":1424175581,"question_id":3,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1729075977,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1424175581/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"10.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        \n        int n = s.length();\n        int max_len = 0;\n\n        int lastIndex[128] = {0};\n        int start = 0;\n\n        for (int end = 0; end < n; end++) {\n\n            char currentChar = s[end];\n            start = max(start, lastIndex[currentChar]);\n            max_len = max(max_len, end - start + 1);\n\n            lastIndex[currentChar] = end + 1;\n        }\n\n        return max_len;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
